response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and satisfaction. This product is not just an item, but a solution designed to enhance your daily life or work experience. Given its unique features and quality, we believe it's worth more than its face value of $150. Considering its market value and the benefits it offers, I'm extending you a special introductory offer at $200. I trust this price reflects the true value and potential impact of the product on your endeavors. Looking forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 200}
